fields.label: Custom Theme Supports
fields.name: custom_theme_supports
fields.instructions: Custom theme supports, one per line.

fields.label: Disable Theme ACF
fields.name: disable_theme_acf
fields.instructions: Disable the theme's version of Advanced Custom Fields and use the plugin instead. WARNING: ACF is required for the theme to work properly, so the plugin MUST be loaded separately if this is disabled.

fields.label: Disable Child Theme Style/Script Enqueue
fields.name: disable_child_theme_enqueue
fields.instructions: Do not automatically enqueue the child theme's style.css, js/vendor.js, or js/app.js.

fields.label: Compulse License Key
fields.name: compulse_license_key
fields.instructions: Use to temporarily override the license key if it has been updated.

fields.label: Enable Admin Developer Mode
fields.name: enable_admin_developer_mode
fields.instructions: Add verbose information to WP Admin, useful only when the site is being built.

fields.label: Enqueue Default Scripts
fields.name: enqueue_default_scripts
fields.instructions: Default WordPress scripts to enqueue on the frontend.

sub_fields.label: Name
sub_fields.name: name
sub_fields.instructions: URL-friendly singular name (lowercase with hypens instead of spaces)

sub_fields.label: Archive Slug
sub_fields.name: archive_slug
sub_fields.instructions: Slug to use for the archive template (i.e. siteurl.com/{archive_slug}/)

sub_fields.label: Rewrite Slug
sub_fields.name: rewrite_slug
sub_fields.instructions: Slug to use for single items (i.e. siteurl.com/{rewrite_slug}/{post_slug}/)

sub_fields.label: Name
sub_fields.name: name
sub_fields.instructions: URL-friendly singular name (lowercase with hypens instead of spaces)

sub_fields.label: Post Types
sub_fields.name: post_types
sub_fields.instructions: Which post types should this taxonomy be associated with?

sub_fields.label: Rewrite Slug
sub_fields.name: rewrite_slug
sub_fields.instructions: Slug to use for single items (i.e. siteurl.com/{rewrite_slug}/{post_slug}/)

sub_fields.label: Template Name
sub_fields.name: block_name
sub_fields.instructions: The template name of the block (without the .php extension) loaded from the theme's "blocks" directory.

fields.label: Maximum Menu Depth
fields.name: maximum_menu_depth
fields.instructions: The maximum depth of all menus. Default is 2 (top level menu with one submenu level).

sub_fields.label: Sidebar ID
sub_fields.name: sidebar_id
sub_fields.instructions: ID to use when referencing this sidebar. Should be lowercase with no spaces.

fields.label: WooCommerce Not Installed
fields.message: WooCommerce is not installed or the plugin is deactivated.
